solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--        public static int maxProduct(String[] words) {--newline--        if (words == null || words.length == 0)--newline--            return 0;--newline--        int len = words.length;--newline--        int[] value = new int[len];--newline--        for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {--newline--            String tmp = words[i];--newline--            value[i] = 0;--newline--            for (int j = 0; j < tmp.length(); j++) {--newline--                value[i] |= 1 << (tmp.charAt(j) - 'a');--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        int maxProduct = 0;--newline--        for (int i = 0; i < len; i++)--newline--            for (int j = i + 1; j < len; j++) {--newline--                if ((value[i] & value[j]) == 0 && (words[i].length() * words[j].length() > maxProduct))--newline--                    maxProduct = words[i].length() * words[j].length();--newline--            }--newline--        return maxProduct;--newline--    }--newline--}
